video.title: Dark Matter
video.synopsis: After waking up aboard a derelict spaceship with no memories, the crew of the Raza investigates the mystery of their identities and destination.

episodes.synopsis: When the crew of a derelict ship awakens with no memories, they soon discover that they're ferrying arms to an off-world colony of rebels.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The crew faces a difficult dilemma: abandon the miners to certain defeat and death, or assist them against insurmountable odds.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Paranoia takes over when the ship mysteriously drops out of faster-than-light speed, suggesting possible sabotage by one of the crew.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Lacking funds, the crew decides to dock at a space station and sell some of their weapons, but the past comes back to haunt several of them.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Assigned to salvage a freighter, the crew is thrown into a pitched battle with the zombie-like denizens of the abandoned ship.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Five volunteers to endure a chemically induced hypnosis to retrieve the crew's stored memories, but she becomes trapped in a dream-like state.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: When the ship's vault is opened, Three comes face-to-face with his past, while One is distracted by a new entertainment-model android.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: While the ship is docked for refueling and repairs, Six tries to locate a man from his past in order to get revenge. One discovers his true identity.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: When Four disappears from the ship following a space station stopover, the crew must make a choice: rescue their fellow crew member or abandon him.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Commander Truffault rescues the crew from an attack but assigns them to steal a mysterious device from a research station, aided by mercenaries.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: The crew of the "Raza" battles their former mercenary partners for control of the ship, while their enemies try to extract information from One.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: A rescue and retrieval operation at a remote research facility becomes a dangerous and surprising homecoming for one member of the crew.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Tensions are dangerously high as the search for a traitor jeopardizes friendships among the crew and leads to some long-held secrets being revealed.
episodes.title: Episode 13
